[Click here](index.html) to go back!

```{r plots, include=FALSE}
data("ny_noaa")

noaa = ny_noaa |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  drop_na() |>
  separate(col=date, into=c("year", "month", "day"), sep="-")

noaa_21cent = noaa |>
  mutate(
    year_n = as.numeric(year),
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin)
  ) |>
  filter(year_n >= 1990, id== "USW00094728")
```
